title: So my pbe account hacked maybe?
body: So I try to log into pbe account and its saying password incorrect and when I try to send a recovery email it isn't showing up in spam or email. Can someone change the email associated with my account?

replies.body: Same thing happened to mine. I couldn't log in and get any emails about it. A buddy of mine saw my IGN as "This Russian Guy" so clearly i was hacked. I made a new pbe, but started out without any money+RP.

Your PBE account is a unique name that you create upon signup, and not the same as your live account credentials.  If this is still an issue, though, reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can assist you directly with recovery.
